fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
An error has occurred during the creation of this Contact.


Please review the error message below and then try again, taking into account any issues highlighted by the error message.


Error Message: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}


If you are unable to resolve the problem yourself then please raise a ticket on ServiceNow (Business Applications, Salesforce, Contacts) making sure to provide all the detail possible, including a link to the record.

fields.name: Existing_Contact_Found
fields.fieldText:
Existing Contact Found


A Contact record for {!vNewContact.FirstName} {!vNewContact.LastName} at {!vNewContact.Account.Name} already exists.


A new Contact has not been created. Please update the existing Contact instead.

fields.name: hContactNumberErrors
fields.fieldText:
Validation Check:

Please ensure the phone & mobile numbers are correct

fields.name: hContactPhoneError
fields.fieldText:
Validation Check:

Please confirm the phone number {!vNewContact.Phone} is correct

fields.name: hContactMobileError
fields.fieldText:
Validation Check:

Please ensure the mobile number {!vNewContact.MobilePhone} is correct
